attributes.action: enable owners of animals which attack people, especially children, to be charged with grievous (or actual) bodily harm; if the victim is killed as a result the charge should be manslaughter.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is, of course, in reaction to the little girl killed by a "pit-bull type" dog; but over the months and years there have been innumerable similar cases.  The Dangerous Dogs Act is obviously far too weak to deal with this problem so something far more effective needs to be done.
